definition: Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]

sentences.english: Three Gorges of Yangtze River are the famous realm of bridges.
sentences.chinese: 長江三峽是舉世罕見的橋樑王國。

sentences.english: Three Gorges region in Yangtze River is the cradle of Wu culture.
sentences.chinese: 長江三峽爲巫文化的起源之地。

sentences.english: Three Gorges of the Yangtze River are a golden tourism waterway .
sentences.chinese: 長江三峽是旅遊的黃金水道。

sentences.english: Cruise Tour is the major component and symbol of the Three Gorges tourism.
sentences.chinese: 遊船旅遊是長江三峽旅遊的主要形式和獨特標誌。

sentences.english: The scenery as one travels by boat along the Changjiang Three Gorges is marvelous.
sentences.chinese: 坐船遊覽長江三峽的時候，兩岸的風景美不勝收。

sentences.english: Have you been to the Yangtse Gorges?
A great part of the Three Gorges appear now in the territory of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 長江三峽的大半段已出現在重慶市境內。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Project is the backbone project for the regulation and development of the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 長江三峽水利樞紐是治理開發長江的關鍵性骨幹工程。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Qutang Gorge, 8 km long gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze in Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4], the upper of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Huangguoshu waterfalls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
to be clogged up/to be congested (traffic, computer network etc)
Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
